Text: [man] Where would you be headin', little thief?
Do you know how long it is to the coast?
You need to be careful, child.
This place isn't safe if you're alone.
Then it's the same as every other place.
Out of nowhere, you send word to meet you.
All this time, I thought you were dead.
I told you last time I was in Cintra that I wasn't coming back.
You've come for your Child of Surprise...
I want you to tell me that he's safe and healthy so I can keep on riding.
Princess Cirilla has been raised by Calanthe since her parents died.
[Mousesack] Pavetta and Duny's ship was lost at sea.
Have you been hiding your head in the sand?
Why do you think she's not safe?
I saw an army making camp at the Amell Pass.
A sea of black and gold.
[Mousesack] Nilfgaard is set on sweeping the Continent.
But since that night at Pavetta's banquet,
the Queen's done everything she can to keep her family safe from threats.
You want me, you kill him first!
The Nilfgaardians don't strike me as foolish.
Coming at us now would be right stupid.
The army whose stink I can smell  on a strong breeze is one I worry about.
So we prepare, same as always.
When does the King return from Skellige, Your Majesty?
This morning. Be good to see that craggy face.
Be better to see the 50 ships the Skelligens promised.
We've taken on every pissant pretender for a dozen years.
If Nilfgaard need to learn the lesson the rest of them have,
I want reports from the Amell Pass every hour...
I warned you about coming back.
I've been away 12 years and I'd planned on staying that way...
till you sent eight men to kill me.
If you treated me more like a friend than a threat...
Do you know the difference anymore?
Who I've raised as my own.
Why would I give my only heir
to someone who never cared enough to come back for her?
Move along, Witcher. I'll pay whatever you want.
Money can't undo the Law of Surprise.
Kings who've tried to outbid destiny
And if I win the war but lose Ciri,
Maybe that army won't come, and if they do, maybe you'll be ready.
But if you have any doubt in your mind that she's safe here,
Call it destiny, security, what larger forces at work,
I will take her, protect her,
and bring her back unharmed, I promise you that.
Ciri is all I have left of my daughter.
If Ciri survives, then Pavetta lives on too.
Law of Surprise has been called.
Oh, sweet Cintra, you were so promising,
from your spoiled princess to your stupid old king!
But when I arrived, the royals were dead!
Tossed out a window or shot in the head!
[devil puppet] So, what to do now? Where's the devil to go?
Anywhere but here. Back in your hole!
[devil puppet] No, don't cast me out on a whim!
Who needs you when I've got him?
Where'd you get a piece like this?
and the Skelligens are a grumpy lot.
I've got one more thing to buy.
and then we'll make room on Clip and Clop
We don't have much, but we've got a sight more than you do.
food, space on the floor to sleep.
A lot's happening on this Continent, but we're safer when we stick together.
We must sacrifice... to fulfill destiny.
but you will always be mine.
I need you to be brave now, because who are you?
Can I say goodbye to my friends now?
I'll summon you when she's ready.
[boy] Go on, Korin, do it! Oh! Gimme.
Korin, Anton, I have to go.
First, you try to kill me, then you lie to me.
I'm just trying to keep Cirilla safe.
Ciri is safe, with me, until the day she takes over my throne.
Let a hedgehog into my court.
So you and destiny can both fuck right off.
Because if Nilfgaard comes, will destiny carry a banner into battle?
We have an army, a navy...
A dynasty can't survive on arrogance alone.
Your own mother cared so little, she discarded you.
You lecture me on a mother's love yet offer up someone else's daughter.
Queen to all of Cintra, grandmother to one.
Get him out of my sight.
I remember when you honored the Law of Surprise.
What if they come and Ciri is trapped?
I fight side by side with my Queen.
You put too much faith in that woman.
After Pavetta died, Calanthe would wake up howling in the night.
Someone who's able to pull themselves out of that,
they'll have my confidence till my final day.
I need your promise you won't come back.
If I hear Ciri's in danger,
you know I can't do that.
[man 2] That's right! No water till you've finished!
All visitors must declare themselves to the officers!
How long will you be in Nazair?
That is yet to be determined.
Until Nilfgaard tore through all the lands.
You don't understand.  Every glyph has a clue
Most are history, but some might be more.
The prophecy, the future, I want to explore all of it.
That's a face. You hate it that much?
[Yennefer] Only because I have taste buds.
Well, these people were starving before Nilfgaard.
See, most kings only care about their cocks and their coffers.
They look out for their people. Everybody gets something.
which tastes as if someone pissed in my cup.
Sounds to me like you bought in.
[Yennefer] How long do you see yourself here?
There's a lot of hill left to dig. Why?
Because I may be missing you.
See, the Yennefer I remember didn't miss anyone.
it's not too late for what we talked about in the cave?
I don't know, two types of ale.
and I'll work as a mage.
I mean, look at you. You could have anyone.
And it was fun to be wanted.
After where I came from, I lapped it up.
But they all loved the power that came with my position at court.
And no one's ever seen that but me?
waiting for this moment where you realized we're meant for each other.
You know, coming up with excuses to study at Aedirn.
Henges, dead languages, anything to get closer to you again, and....
every request I made was denied.
Stregobor, of all people, snapped me out of it.
Remembered why I loved it. The beauty, the purity. No...
You went after the thing you loved.
At least you kept your eyes.
Well, I would, but we don't have much time.
Nilfgaard is conscripting mages like us into their service.
Now, since I don't have a letter of safe conduct,
and yours is probably fake, we should go,
before those lads start asking questions.
that's exactly what Tissaia and I need.
She said you're the best student she ever taught.
Their army's camped near Cintra, and we think they're going to attack.
We need allies from the Northern Kingdoms.
I'll leave this to the people who actually give a shit. Where's Tissaia?
Fine, I'll just follow the sound of crying girls.
[Vilgefortz] She has no idea you're here.
You said she asked for me.
I told you that she said you were her best student.
I'm the one that wants you here.
It took five minutes for the lies to start.
Why did I expect anything else from a place held together by bullshit?
[Tissaia, echoing] Do you know how many people wouldn't blink if you died?
[Tissaia] Sometimes, the best thing a flower can do for us is die.
At least I had control over that.
What the hell's going on in here?
If I gave Rectress de Vries  your pitiful excuse about that pitiful plant,
Before anyone you know was born.
I bet you hate botany as much as I did.
Who wants to know what those herbs are really good for?
They've taught you about its healing powers
But they leave out  that if you mix these two together,
Miss tells us never to mix herbs.
They tell you that so you have to go to them for all the answers.
It'll save you a lifetime of heartbreak.
You want to know a secret?
[Yennefer] Glacella, whatever you lack in talent, you make up for in confidence.
[Fola] She doesn't need confidence. Her father owns half of Creyden.
So he could swap a hundred horses for her spot here.
The Chapter decided it needed students from the best families.
But you all must have had a conduit moment?
We shouldn't be mixing herbs. We shouldn't even be here.
You know, if they catch us, they really will expel us.
There are far worse things than expulsion.
Enough bridled chaos to keep the curtains hung...
and the torches lit, but that's not what we're here for.
[Fola] Wait. I've got so many questions.
so the only family, the only loyalty you have,
And you'll trade it all for what?
But you don't have to do it.
But what if I want to?
Just because you fucked up, doesn't mean we will.
With all the magical talent of shoe leather?
You'll have a home here forever, Glacella.
With my sisters who never ascended.
[young Yennefer] You turned my friend into a slug.
Come, push your friend into the pool.
[Yennefer] I don't care what you do, but remember this.
Even if you do everything right,
that's still no guarantee you'll get what you want.
[Yennefer] I never even wanted to come back here!
[sighs] Then you failed at that, too.
Letting in girls who can't even do magic!
Sometimes, you have to compromise in order to survive.
You say I never took responsibility for the way my life turned out.
[girl] But what's happening? I don't understand...
I tried finding you for years.
An emergency conclave of the Northern Mages.
[Artorius] Going to war against Nilfgaard is madness.
They've rejected our mages for decades, so let's grant them their wish.
Nilfgaard won't be satisfied until they have the whole Continent.
And how do you know this?
Because that's the same lie I would tell.
I'm the only one here that's led soldiers into battle.
Oh, yes, and don't we know it?
All those years swinging his sword around were years he wasn't serving as a mage.
Or killing babies born at an eclipse.
We can stop Nilfgaard, if we act now.
The south... well, is the south.
It is up to the north to unite.
It is time to convince our kings to send their armies.
make it to Sodden by week's end.
Because our kingdoms will be next.
Our fight is with Cintra, and only Cintra.
In Nilfgaard, we know what it's like to have corrupt leaders.
But under our new leader, Emperor Emhyr, we've changed.
whilst Queen Calanthe has done nothing but put them up.
I am not here to defend Cintra.
But I will defend our way of life.
the order that we have built up over centuries.
Most of us came from Aretuza and Ban Ard.
We've simply charted a different path,
That makes us cousins, not enemies.
[Fringilla] When in training, yes.  Like soldiers.
[Triss] You also believe in forbidden magic.
[Fringilla] Forbidden magic is one of the ghost stories taught to us here.
There is no such thing as dark or light magic.
[Fringilla] Nothing in this world is as simple as that.
You think that we're destroying the Continent.
We know that if we take Cintra, we have a chance of saving it.
If you won't take sides, then at least stay out of our way.
[Stregobor] Ah, enough of this tiring debate.
Let them reap what they sow.
First, you install your niece at Nilfgaard,
and now you want to ram through a vote.
[Fringilla] To be fair, Yennefer of Vengerberg
is the one I have to thank for my posting.
If she had taken it, I wouldn't be where I am today.
If only Yennefer had gone to Nilfgaard.
With her at the helm, they'd still be a shitty backwater.
Instead, I went to a prized kingdom and did fuck all for decades.
Helped murderers and rapists keep their crown.
Maybe it is time for something different.
Pipe down. You-- you don't get a vote.
If I did, I'd vote to burn it all down.
Cintra has chosen to turn its back on us.
They are proud, and smart, and difficult, yes.
But I'd wager above all else...
We have called them a lost cause for years.
that we risk not only our lives, but our pride,
of letting Cintra continue their proud tradition
I know you hate this place, but there are girls who need it.
Those who have only ever known chaos until we teach them control.
[softly] That's why Vilgefortz and I and some others are going to fight.
Did you hear a word I just said?
If you will not do it for the Brotherhood, then do it for me.
Have you ever used that word before?
the Nilfgaardians will breach the castle gates.
If I can bring him here...
destiny may yet side with us.
then there is still hope for her.
Continue to be brave. Promise me.
You are the Lion Cub of Cintra.
You are destined for great things.
I can't do this without you.
Tell me what I want to know and you'll live.
Ah... we shall be born anew. [wheezes]
What signs these shall be I say unto--
[Ciri] I should've traded that ring for food.
[laughs] Gods, what kind of crazy person talks to a horse?
[gasps] You made it out. You're all right!
I told you it was her at the market.
You don't give the orders anymore, Princess.
Rumor is Nilfgaard's looking for you.
And willing to pay a barrel of orens, too.
I'm sorry if your family got hurt.
This isn't you. I know it.
You thought you were better than us because we had to let you win?
The only thing special about you was the fucking crown on your head.
[overlapping voices] Verily, I say unto you
the era of the sword and the ax is nigh,
the era of the Wolf's Blizzard.
The Time of the White Chill and the White Light is nigh...
...the Time of Madness and the Time of Contempt.
